original_text: But when the fourteenth night was come, as we were driven up and down in Adria, about midnight the shipmen deemed that they drew near to some country;
korean_text: 열나흘째 되는 날 밤에 우리가 아드리아 바다에서 이리 저리 쫓겨가다가 자정쯤 되어 사공들이 어느 육지에 가까워지는 줄을 짐작하고

sentences.original_text: But when the fourteenth night was come
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 열네 번째 밤이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: as we were driven up and down in Adria
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 아드리아 해역에서 이리저리 떠밀리고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: they drew near to some country
